title: Spa Retreat on Myanmar’s Picturesque Inle Lake
description: Immerse yourself in the beauty of Myanmar’s Inle Lake at Sofitel Inle Lake Myat Min, home to the country’s first wellness concept spa. Located on the shores of the lake, between 20 acres of rice fields and floating gardens, this is the ultimate way to experience unspoiled Myanmar. Includes daily buffet breakfast, one buffet dinner for two, a nightly glass of house wine or beer, return private airport transfers and more. Plus, two children (aged 11 years and under) stay free on existing bedding.
offer_address: Pin Laung Road Thaleoo Village, Myanmar (Burma)
